definition: jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to burn both jade and common stone/to destroy indiscriminately (idiom)
lit. to use a sacred tripod as cooking pot and jade as ordinary stone (idiom); fig. a waste of precious material/casting pearls before swine

sentences.english: Boguan Advertisement has been committed to providing advertising services for the jewel and jade industry.
sentences.chinese: 博观广告一直致力于珠宝玉石领域的专业广告服务。

sentences.english: The "Guangdong green" jade deposit is situated in Wuzhishan area, Ningxian county, Guangdong Province.

sentences.english: Ideas on search for minerals and exploitation of precious stone resources in Sichuan are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 就四川宝玉石普查找矿和开发利用提出了见解。

sentences.english: A large Jade boulder flanked by vessels from the Qianlong Garden, in the middle of the 180-acre Forbidden City in Beijing, is in the exhibit.

sentences.english: So in my third year, I was working at Jade Pier over in Pasadena.
sentences.chinese: 第三年的时候，我在帕萨迪纳的玉石码头工作。

sentences.english: The textures of the synthetic jadeite jade stone are more simple than that of the natural jadeite jade.

sentences.english: Because I had no thought of opening, and do the jade to appraise the.

sentences.english: All the gems that have been discovered occur in the hypometamorphic rock belts.
sentences.chinese: 已发现的宝玉石均产于深变质岩带中。

sentences.english: Chu's once in ChuShan and found a piece of jade called equipments.

sentences.english: Experimental research was made on the improving of the grinding wheel for polishing jade.
sentences.chinese: 文章针对提高玉石抛光砂轮的性能开展实验研究。

sentences.english: The flaws on this piece of jade do not affect the value of the entire set of jade.
sentences.chinese: 这块玉石上的疵瑕并不影响整块玉的价值。

sentences.english: In The Marble Faun Hawthorne said of a building in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 霍桑在《玉石雕像》里谈到罗马的建筑。

sentences.english: Chapter IV, legal suggestion to Xiuyan jade industry.
sentences.chinese: 第四章“岫岩县玉石产业可持续发展的立法建议”。

sentences.english: By hundreds of millions of years of evolution and contains natural jade.
sentences.chinese: 经几亿年蕴育演化而形成的纯天然玉石。

sentences.english: The large bowlder surface of dinner table must be uplifted vertically in avoidance of breakage.
sentences.chinese: 大面积的餐台玉石面，必须竖抬，避免餐台断裂。

sentences.english: It refers to the malachite craft classification standard to classify with the craft of HeTian jade.

definition: Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
sheep-fat white jade, a type of jade

lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
